verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> came to <S%H559>me.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies:<s%> "I am <S%H7065>jealous<s%> for <S%H6726>Zion<s%> with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7068>jealousy,<s%> and I am <S%H7065>jealous<s%> for her with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2534>wrath.<s%>"

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> "I have <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> and will <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> shall be <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H5892><s%> 'The City of <S%H571>Truth;<s%>' and the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> <S%H6944><s%> 'The Holy <S%H2022>Mountain.<s%>'"

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies:<s%> "Old <S%H2205>men<s%> and old <S%H2205>women<s%> will again <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H7339>streets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> with his <S%H4938>staff<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%> for <S%H7230>very<s%> <S%H3117>age.<s%>
The <S%H7339>streets<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> will be <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H3206>boys<s%> and <S%H3207>girls<s%> <S%H7832>playing<s%> in its <S%H7339>streets.<s%>"

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies:<s%> "If it is <S%H6381>marvelous<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of this <S%H5971>people<s%> in those <S%H3117>days,<s%> should it also be <S%H6381>marvelous<s%> in my <S%H5869>eyes?<s%>" <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies:<s%> <S%H3467>"Behold,<s%> I will save my <S%H5971>people<s%> from the <S%H4217>east<s%> <S%H776>country,<s%> and from the <S%H3996>west<s%> <S%H776>country;<s%>

and I will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H7931>them,<s%> and they will dwell in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> and they will be my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and I will be their <S%H430>God,<s%> in <S%H571>truth<s%> and in <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>"

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies:<s%> "Let your <S%H3027>hands<s%> be <S%H2388>strong,<s%> you who <S%H8085>hear<s%> in these <S%H3117>days<s%> these <S%H1697>words<s%> from the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> who were in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that the <S%H3245>foundation<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> was <S%H3245>laid,<s%> even the <S%H1964>temple,<s%> that it might be <S%H1129>built.<s%>

For <S%H6440>before<s%> those <S%H3117>days<s%> there <S%H1961>was<s%> no <S%H7939>wages<s%> for <S%H120>man,<s%> nor any <S%H7939>wages<s%> for an <S%H929>animal;<s%> neither was there any <S%H7965>peace<s%> to him who went <S%H3318>out<s%> or came <S%H935>in,<s%> because of the <S%H6862>adversary.<s%> For I <S%H7971>set<s%> all <S%H120>men<s%> <S%H376>everyone<s%> against his <S%H7453>neighbor.<s%>
But now I will not be to the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of this <S%H5971>people<s%> as in the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%>" <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies.<s%>

"For the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%> and the <S%H1612>vine<s%> will <S%H5414>yield<s%> its <S%H6529>fruit,<s%> and the <S%H776>ground<s%> will <S%H5414>give<s%> its <S%H2981>increase,<s%> and the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> will <S%H5414>give<s%> their <S%H2919>dew;<s%> and I will cause the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of this <S%H5971>people<s%> to inherit all these <S%H5157>things.<s%>

It shall come to pass <S%H7045>that,<s%> as you were a curse among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> so will I <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H1293>you,<s%> and you shall be a blessing. <S%H3372>Don't<s%> be afraid. Let your <S%H3027>hands<s%> be <S%H2388>strong.<s%>"

For thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies:<s%> "As I <S%H2161>thought<s%> to do <S%H7489>evil<s%> to <S%H1>you,<s%> when your fathers provoked me to <S%H7107>wrath,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> "and I <S%H5162>didn't<s%> repent;

so <S%H7725>again<s%> have I <S%H2161>thought<s%> in these <S%H3117>days<s%> to do <S%H3190>good<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%> <S%H3372>Don't<s%> be afraid.

These are the <S%H1697>things<s%> that you shall <S%H6213>do:<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> the <S%H571>truth<s%> with his <S%H7453>neighbor.<s%> <S%H8199>Execute<s%> the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> of <S%H571>truth<s%> and <S%H7965>peace<s%> in your <S%H8179>gates,<s%>

and let <S%H376>none<s%> of you <S%H2803>devise<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in your <S%H3824>hearts<s%> against his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> and <S%H157>love<s%> no <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H7621>oath:<s%> for all these are things that I <S%H8130>hate,<s%>" <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> came to <S%H559>me.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies:<s%> "The <S%H6685>fasts<s%> of the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H2549>fifth,<s%> <S%H7637>seventh,<s%> and <S%H6224>tenth<s%> months shall be for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H8342>joy<s%> and <S%H8057>gladness,<s%> and <S%H2896>cheerful<s%> <S%H4150>feasts.<s%> Therefore <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H571>truth<s%> and <S%H7965>peace.<s%>"
Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies:<s%> "Many <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> will yet <S%H935>come;<s%>

and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> shall <S%H1980>go<s%> to <S%H259>another,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3212><s%> 'Let us go <S%H1980>speedily<s%> to <S%H2470>entreat<s%> the <S%H6440>favor<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and to <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies.<s%> I will go <S%H3212>also.<s%>'

<S%H7227>Yes,<s%> many <S%H5971>peoples<s%> and <S%H6099>strong<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> will <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and to <S%H2470>entreat<s%> the <S%H6440>favor<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>"

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies:<s%> "In those <S%H3117>days,<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> will take <S%H2388>hold,<s%> out of all the <S%H3956>languages<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> they will take <S%H2388>hold<s%> of the <S%H3671>skirt<s%> of him who is a <S%H376>Jew,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3212><s%> 'We will go with <S%H8085>you,<s%> for we have heard that God is with <S%H430>you.<s%>'"
